Hydrogen.Description: Hydrogen combines with oxygen to form water, which is essential for various sustainable energy processes.
Hydrogen is used as a reactant in fuel cells to produce electricity, making it a key component in sustainable energy technologies.
Hydrogen is used as a reactant in the production of ammonia, which is used as a fertilizer and plays a role in sustainable agriculture.
